item.title: [Video Editing] Ongoing Help with Editing Video for YouTube and Social Media! - Upwork
item.description:
# Who You Are #

An experienced, creative and professional Video Editor who has a keen attention to detail and loves working with market-leading, fast-growing businesses on interesting projects. 🚀


# Experience #

We'd love to work with you if you have experience editing and publishing video, especially for social media and YouTube.

Bonus points if you also have experience with publishing podcasts (audio editing + submitting to iTunes, etc.)


# Who We Are #

We are MemberFix—the #1 WordPress Membership Site Tech Agency in the world. 💪

We help $1MM+ WordPress-based membership / eLearning businesses solve technical challenges via custom development services and leading edge hosting.

And we support and host some of the most exciting and well-known membership sites and brands in the world, across a wide variety of verticals.

Our Core Values are:

- We are innovative
- We are resourceful
- We get things done


# The Collaboration #

1 - Together, we will produce a variety of video content on a predictable publishing schedule.

Types of content include:

- Interviews
- Case Studies
- Tutorials
- Solo podcasts (talking head)

2 - The formats that we'll publish in include:

- Full size HD interview videos (for YouTube mainly)
- Reels (for IG, Facebook, TikTok, etc.)
- Social Media posts (Insta, FB, LinkedIn)

3 - The main platforms we'll be using are:

- YouTube
- iTunes / Google's podcast platform
- LinkedIn
- Facebook

We'll also experiment with:

- Instagram
- TikTok
- Reddit
- X

4 - MemberFix will provide a subscription to any necessary software in order to produce the best content.

Currently we use Kapwing and Veed.io but you can use any tools you're comfortable with.

5 - The following are examples of the type of work you'll be asked to do:

- Remove silences
- Remove filler words
- Clean / improve audio
- Normalize audio
- Edit out specified parts of video / audio
- Generate and edit captions
- Generate reels
- Upload files to a shared Google Drive folder
- Upload finished media to Social Media
- Collaborate together within ClickUp on our Kanban board

...many of these functions are performed automatically using AI video editing tools.

However, you would also be responsible for ensuring that the final media is polished, e.g.

- Captions are accurate
- No strange clipping or jerky edits
- Audio and video are as high quality as can be

6 - Here's what we expect of you:

A) Clear, direct communication

This means being direct with what you need from our side to do your best work, managing OUR expectations, and keeping us updated per our mutual agreement.

Beating around the bush and being overly diplomatic is not our style.

Say what you have to say politely, but say it directly! :)

B) Professionalism

We have a zero tolerance policy for excuses, complaining, missed deadlines, long lapses in communication, preventable mistakes, and poor quality / reduced quality output.

Note: you will never be held accountable for anything we haven't made explicitly clear—that is OUR job.

However, once we've clarified and documented exactly what to do and what's expected of you, we will hold you to those standards.

TLDR; if you're a professional you have absolutely nothing to worry about.

C) Timeliness

Publishing content requires consistency and honoring our content calendar.

Therefore, we expect deadlines to be taken seriously from both our side and yours. :)

D) Proactivity

While we provide documentation, training, etc., we do not micromanage our team members.

Therefore, we expect you to take be proactive in your duties and make decisions according to your best judgement.

If something needs to be done, you will take it upon yourself to do it without being asked or prompted.

E) Growth mindset

This includes the ability to respond appropriately to constructive criticism, and to use every situation as an opportunity to learn and improve.

We're looking for free-thinking team members for a long term collaboration, not robots!

The right individual also has the opportunity to grow to the next level WITH us, both professionally and personally.

***

I look forward to meeting with you soon!

Vic Dorfman
Founder - MemberFix | MemberHost

Hourly Range: $5.00-$55.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 07:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, YouTube Video, Instagram Reels, Testimonial Video, AI-Generated Video, Video Intro & Outro, Promotional Video, Demo Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Audio Editing, YouTube Marketing
Skills: Social Media Video, YouTube Video, Instagram Reels, Testimonial Video, AI-Generated Video, Video Intro & Outro, Promotional Video, Demo Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Audio Editing, YouTube Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Stylish E-Commerce Website and Graphics Needed - Upwork
item.description:
Stylish clean website needed.

Website will have various pages including the following pages:
Home/About
Reviews
Blog/Vlog
Estore for physical and non-physical goods separated into categories/different pages

Website needs to have an estore and thus customized for same.

Website may also need to have a login for wholesale purchases.

Website needs to be seo optimized and use branding colours.

I would like to complete the work in phases and set deadlines for each phase.

Would like to make logo and possibly some graphics as well. Editing/making videos would be an asset.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$17.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 06:58 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:WordPress, Photo Editing, Website Asset, Logo Design, Graphic Design, Web Design, Ecommerce, Video Editing
Skills: WordPress, Photo Editing, Website Asset, Logo Design, Graphic Design, Web Design, Ecommerce, Video Editing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Music Video animation 3d/2d - Upwork
item.description:
Project Title: Animation Music Video

Description:

I am looking for a talented animator to create a vibrant and engaging animated music video for my rap, Hip/hop unreleased/released track. The video should be visually captivating, telling a story that complements the music.

Requirements:

• Experience in 2D/ 3D animation
• Ability to develop a storyboard based on the song’s themes.
• Creativity in character design and backgrounds.
• Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines.
• Collaboration to ensure the animation aligns with the song’s mood and style.

If you have a portfolio that showcases your previous work in cartoon animation, I’d love to see it. Looking forward to working with a creative professional who can bring my music to life!


Here are three examples of a different artist of their music video
https://youtu.be/V6ZsXKE8QmQ?si=5bQnszIiUW6xYCYv
https://youtu.be/leJNDpm_G10?si=Plk3zoviDL8xmFW-
https://youtu.be/JFm7YDVlqnI?si=g_IS7KtWKhadD9BD

Hourly Range: $16.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 06:56 UTC
Category: 3D Animation
Skills:Animation, 3D Animation, 2D Animation, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Character Design, Adobe After Effects, Animated Environment
Skills: Animation, 3D Animation, 2D Animation, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Character Design, Adobe After Effects, Animated Environment
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Short Form Video Editor Position at Agency - Upwork
item.description:
Hi editors, hope you are doing great!

My name is Alvie and I run a content creation agency for online fitness coaches.

We specialize in creating and editing engaging reels/shorts for coaches, including talking head videos with captions and effects, as well as short text on the screen reels.

We're looking for an editor to come in and work on all of our clients' content: talking head videos, text on the screen videos, motivational videos etc.

This is a long term project and we are excited to partner with a dedicated editor on our team.

Thanks a lot, looking forward to reading your proposals!
Alvie

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 06:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: CapCut, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented Social Media Content Creator to join our team. As a Content Creator, you will be responsible for designing and creating 3 creatives and editing 1 reel video per week for our Instagram account. Your main goal will be to produce high-quality and engaging content that aligns with our brand image.

Skills needed:
- Graphic design
- Video editing
- Social media management
- Creativity
- Attention to detail

This is a great opportunity for someone who is passionate about social media and has experience in content creation. If you have a keen eye for aesthetics and can deliver captivating visuals, we would love to hear from you.

Size: Small
Duration: Under 1 month
Expertise: intermediate

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 29, 2024 06:33 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Facebook
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Facebook
Country: India

item.title: Seeking Skilled YouTube Video Editor for UFC and MMA Boxing Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented and passionate video editor with a keen interest in UFC and MMA boxing to join our team. This role involves editing videos specifically tailored for YouTube, with a focus on engaging and dynamic content in the combat sports genre.

Responsibilities:

Edit videos in the UFC and MMA boxing genre, ensuring they are engaging and high-quality.
Sync voiceover files to video content seamlessly.
Implement creative editing techniques to enhance viewer engagement.
Work with a variety of video lengths and formats, primarily for YouTube.
Collaborate closely with our team to align with the overall content strategy.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing, preferably with a portfolio showcasing work in sports, particularly UFC and MMA boxing.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
Ability to edit videos to match voiceovers provided.
Strong understanding of YouTube's platform and best practices for video content.
Excellent communication skills and ability to adhere to deadlines.
Payment:

$30 per video at the start.
Potential for long-term engagement based on quality of work.
To Apply:

Please submit your portfolio showcasing relevant work. To ensure you have read the job description thoroughly, include the phrase "Combat Ready" at the beginning of your application.

Video style: Check out this youtube channel. Apply only If you can do a similar style videos

https://www.youtube.com/@votesport

Budget: $22
Posted On: June 29, 2024 06:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Video, YouTube Shorts, Documentary, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing, Documentary Video
Skills: YouTube Video, YouTube Shorts, Documentary, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing, Documentary Video
Country: United States
click to apply
